title: Aphex Twin
summary: Richard David James (born 18 August 1971), best known by the alias Aphex Twin and less prominently as AFX,[1][2][nb 1] is a  British musician, composer and DJ.[3] He is best known for his idiosyncratic work in electronic styles such as techno, ambient, and jungle.[11] Music journalists from publications including Mixmag, The New York Times, NME, Fact, Clash and The Guardian have called James one of the most influential or important contemporary electronic musicians.[23]
